scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:sync && npm run deploy:api
scripts.deploy:sidecar: cp -Lr livestore-sidecar dist/sidecar && cd dist/sidecar && npm i &&  wrangler containers build -p -t registry.cloudflare.com/geist-filecoin-livestore-sidecar:latest .
scripts.deploy:sync: npm run build && wrangler -c livestore-sync/wrangler.jsonc deploy
scripts.deploy:api: npm run build && wrangler -c api/wrangler.jsonc deploy
